metadata.name: Camisola WoF #1
metadata.description: The 4th collection of World of Football consists of a series of jerseys split into 4 corners with different designs, all designed in 4K by the talented sports designer Pascal Hugo. Holding one of the Camisola NFTs allow you to receive a one year membership to our professional club Forjães SC which gives you voting rights to elect our president, one IRL authentic Forjães jersey (includes shipping), a special discount code to use at our online team store, private online meet-and-greet with our players and stuff and many more exclusive utilities and benefits. Visit worldoffootball.io or forjaessc.com for more information
